title: Electron Network
shortDescription: A federation of community groups and meetups with aligned values
benefits: Maintain independence while benefiting from collaboration

title: Electron Workshop Sprints
shortDescription: A structured 13-day collaborative framework to advance community projects
benefits: Runs Wednesday through Monday (with Tuesday as a reset day)
Accommodates various expertise levels and availability
Provides clear roles for different contributors

title: Infrastructure Support
shortDescription: Technical support for community organizations in partnership with Free Software Australia
benefits: Hosting free and open source tools for community groups
Providing digital infrastructure to support collaboration
Creating documentation standards and knowledge sharing

title: Special Interest Groups (SIGs)
shortDescription: Expert groups providing specialized assistance and knowledge
benefits: Provide specialized assistance to community inquiries
Serve as liaisons to universities and other institutions
